isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - INSTALL - UNIVERSAL JOINT COMPANION FLANGE OR YOKE

svcproc.title: UNIVERSAL JOINT COMPANION FLANGE OR YOKE

step1.para: For models so equipped, install speedometer drive gear or replacement spacer in position on the hub of the companion flange or yoke ( Figure 422). Install the companion flange or yoke on splines of the output shaft and move into rear bearing cover.

figure.caption: Figure 421. Install Companion Flange or Yoke on Splines of Output Shaft

note.para: For 14608LL models, the speedometer drive gear or replacement spacer is installed on the output shaft prior to installation of the rear bearing cover.

step1.para: Lock the transmission by engaging two mainshaft gears with sliding clutches ( Figure 423). Install the washer and/or nut on the output shaft and tighten nut to 450 to 500 ft-lbs. (610 to 678 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 422. Engage Two Mainshaft Gears With Sliding Clutches
